name: The Ancient (Unic)
description:
Inspired by Blizzard's HearthStone the game.
This is the turn-based game for two players. Goal of each player is to awake the Ancient: player that collects 100+ "awakening points" wins. Use your mouse to control the game.

Created by:
- Unic: main concept, design, programming
- Sangeron: graphics, concept features, testing

Update 1 ("Ancient2.zip"):
- multiplayer (Alt+C);
- reorganized project resources;
- few bugfixes.

Update 2 ("Ancient3.zip"):
- AI (Alt+1, Alt+2);
- menu (right click);
- nicer messages.
